line_1: Nor ever breaks it, till appears a third.
line_2: Yet still he swears, and still he keeps his word,

line_1: The gayer world that moves round George the third.
line_2: She deems ungraceful, trifling and absurd,

line_1: When luckily came by a third —
line_2: To him the question they refer'd;

line_1: Though no farther expect than to heaven the third.
line_2: Well! I'll pray to our prophet and get you prefer'd;

line_1: Starv'd by two houses, priest-rid by a third.
line_2: Plagues we should feel sufficient, on my word,

line_1: Here then are two — but where's the third?
line_2: Go search your school, you'll find the Bird.

line_1: Oh! should his uncle die, he'd spend a third;
line_2: Two good estates are gone — Who'll take his word?
